Location aliases¶

Bazaar defines several aliases for locations associated with a branch. These can be used with most commands that expect a location, such as brz push.

The aliases are:

:bound     The branch this branch is bound to, for bound branches.
:parent    The parent of this branch.
:public    The public location of this branch.
:push      The saved location used for `brz push` with no arguments.
:submit    The submit branch for this branch.
:this      This branch.

For example, to push to the parent location:

brz push :parent
